description: The legendary ÄRM in the first two MÄR-Heaven war, wielded by captain of MÄR, Ginta. Ever since the 2nd war concluded, he`s been traveling around searching for Ginta, and ended up sleeping in a lake until Kai wakes him up. Babbo has no magic stone inserted, so it can not transform into his previous versions. However, Babbo has new versions.
name: Babbo
